  • Method Details

    • login

      User login(String emailId, String password) throws UserNotFoundException
      Method to validate the credentials of a user
      Parameters:
      emailId - of the user
      password - of the user
      Returns:
      returns a User containing user info if found in the system else returns null
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException

    • registerStudent

      String registerStudent(String name, String contactNumber, String email, String password, String branch, String batch) throws EmailAlreadyInUseException
      Method to register a new student in the system
      Parameters:
      name - of the user
      contact - number of the user
      emailId - of the user
      password - of the user
      branch - of the user
      batch - of the user
      Returns:
      returns a string that indicates if the student is successfully registered in the system
      Throws:
      EmailAlreadyInUseException

    • updatePassword

      String updatePassword(String email, String oldPassword, String newPassword) throws UserNotFoundException
      Method to update password of the user
      Parameters:
      emailId - of the user
      old - password of the user
      new - password of the user
      Returns:
      returns a string that indicates if the password is changed successfully
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException
